lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Despite reports of an upturn in sales at rivals Digital Equipment Corp <DEC> and International Business Machines Corp <IBM>, Data General said it was not convinced that the minicomputer market had emerged from a two-year slump.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the products are part of a new strategy of providing industry-standard systems that allow computers from different vendors to share and exchange information.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lyons said new hardware and software introduced by the company are a response to customers who want to tie together their growing number of PCs and to connect them with larger mini and mainframe computers.

lst.name: sentence
